title.text: Shared Task on Prediction of Dropout Over Time in Massively Open Online Courses

abstractContent.text: The shared task on Prediction of Dropout Over Time in MOOCs involves analysis of data from 6 MOOCs offered through Coursera.

entities.text: Prediction of Dropout Over Time in MOOCs

abstractContent.text: Data from one MOOC with approximately 30K students was distributed as training data and consisted of discussion forum data (in SQL) and clickstream data (in JSON format).
The prediction task was Predicting Attrition Over Time.
Based on behav-ioral data from a week's worth of activity in a MOOC fora student, predict whether the student will cease to actively participate after that week.
A full write up of the results is published separately (Rosé & Siemens, 2014).
